UX Lead &Designer .

I'm a designer who cares about solving meaningful problems and making things feel simple. I thrive in ambiguity and enjoy bringing structure to unclear spaces. I collaborate closely with stakeholders to understand business goals, and I use qualitative research to uncover the real needs and motivations of users.

I design and prototype in whatever makes sense — generally starting on paper and moving to advanced-level Figma, code, or AI as the work evolves. Design isn't linear or one-size-fits-all, and adaptation and iteration are crucial parts of my process, but the foundations stay the same: empathise, define, ideate, prototype, test, iterate.

Collaboration comes naturally. I work with engineers and product teams throughout — not just at handoff — and I'm as comfortable leading a team through complexity as I am working independently. I'm used to navigating competing priorities and misaligned stakeholders, making balanced decisions, and staying calm when deadlines get tight.

My front-end background keeps my thinking grounded in what's actually buildable. I test usability throughout the process, validating assumptions early and iterating on what I learn — so problems surface before build, not after.

I'm focused on creating work that's clear, thoughtful, and genuinely useful. If that sounds like what you're looking for, I'd love to chat — please get in touch.
